metadata.title: About Us
metadata.description: Learn more about the mission, vision, beliefs, and leadership behind The Wind Church in Riverside, CA.

mission.title: Mission
mission.subtitle: Honor the Lord, love God's people, and serve our generation.
mission.description: Our church mission is to honor the Lord by demonstrating our love for God and His people through dedicated service to our generation.

vision.title: Vision
vision.subtitle: Growing God's family through love, service, and discipleship.
vision.description: Our vision is to expand God's family through love, compassionate service, and committed discipleship, creating a nurturing environment where individuals grow in their faith and are equipped to make a positive impact in the world.

history.title: My History
history.description: From a young age, Pastor Singletary felt a profound calling to serve the Lord in an extraordinary way. This vision became a reality when he recommitted his life to Jesus Christ on June 26, 1998, and shortly after married his wife, Amber, in 2000. Together, they have faithfully served in various ministry roles, blessed with three wonderful children. Pastor Singletary served under Dr. Michael Edwards for 18 years, holding positions such as Associate Minister, Youth Pastor, Young Adult Facilitator, Children's Church Team member, Church Council Chairperson, Elder, and Assistant Pastor. His extensive experience and dedication prepared him for his current role as Senior Pastor.

why.title: Why I am a Pastor
why.description: Pastor Singletary's journey to becoming a pastor was rooted in a deep, early conviction to serve God and His people. His calling was solidified through years of faithful service and spiritual growth under the mentorship of Dr. Michael Edwards. He views his role as an awesome privilege and is committed to fulfilling God's purpose for The Wind.

goals.title: Future Goals
goals.description: Pastor Singletary is committed to both spiritual and educational growth. As a bi-vocational pastor, he encourages others to pursue knowledge and understanding. He holds a Bachelor's degree, three Master's degrees, and is currently pursuing a Doctorate of Ministry. His goal is to inspire others to serve God wholeheartedly and advance the Kingdom of God using their gifts and talents.

fact.title: Fun Fact
fact.description: Pastor Singletary often reminds his congregation that “We are a BATTLESHIP, not a CRUISESHIP!” This borrowed mantra reflects his belief that the church's mission is to serve and advance God's Kingdom, rather than seeking to be served. His messages are known for being practical, relevant, and inspiring, resonating with people of all backgrounds.

values.title: It is more than just a Sunday service
values.subtitle: The Wind is a center for cultivating the gifts God has blessed each indivudal

jesus.title: We Follow Jesus
jesus.description: A Christ-driven church is the core of our beliefs

worship.title: We Worship
worship.description: Every moment is a time of worship and fellowship in the Wind family

family.title: We're Family
family.description: Our focus is nurturing friendships and bonds that go beyond the church walls. Once a Wind nation, always a wind nation

serve.title: We Serve
serve.description: Our goal of developing the Wind presence in our local community starts with service. As individuals and as a unit, we strive to model that ways of Christ

love.title: We Love
love.description: All individuals in all walks of life, seasons, and variety deserve the love of Christ, and we will love you as perfectly as we know how

transform.title: We Transform
transform.description: Change is a forever process for all of us. The Lord welcomes growth through any situations, and every day is chance bettering ourselves and our family

foursquare.title: We're a Foursquare Church
foursquare.subtitle: Church Movement
foursquare.description: We are rooted in the teachings of Jesus Christ and focused on four key aspects of his ministry: Jesus as the Savior, Baptizer with the Holy Spirit, Healer, and Soon-Coming King. In our church, we embrace these principles to guide our worship.

plan.title: The Plan of Salvation
plan.description: We believe that while we were yet sinners Christ died for us, signing the pardon of all who believe on Him Salvation Through Grace

salvation.title: Salvation Through Grace
salvation.description: We believe that we have no righteousness and must come to God pleading the righteousness of Christ

scriptures.title: The Holy Scriptures
scriptures.description: We believe the Bible is God-inspired

eternal.title: The Eternal Godhead
eternal.description: We believe God is Triun: Father, Son & Holy Spirit

fall.title: The Fall of Man
fall.description: We believe that man was created in the image of God, but that by voluntary disobedience he fell from perfection

accordionItem2.title: Jesus Christ the Baptizer with the Holy Spirit

relationship.title: Church Relationship
relationship.description: We believe it is our sacred duty to identify ourselves with the visible Body of Christ

civil.title: Civil Government
civil.description: We believe that rulers should be upheld at all times, except in things opposed to the will of God

final.title: The Final Judgement
final.description: We believe that all shall stand some day before the judgement seat of God, and there receive eternal life or death

heaven.title: Heaven
heaven.description: We believe that Heaven is the glorious eternal home of born-again believers

hell.title: Hell
hell.description: We believe that hell is the place of eternal torment for all who reject Christ as the Savior

repent.title: Repentance & Acceptance
repent.description: We believe that upon sincere repentance and a whole-hearted acceptance of Christ, we are justified before God

new.title: The New Birth
new.description: We believe that the change which takes place in the heart and life at conversion is a very real one

daily.title: Daily Christian Living
daily.description: We believe that it is the will of God that we be sanctified daily, growing constantly in the faith

supper.title: Baptism & The Lord's Supper
supper.description: We believe that baptism by immersion is an outward sign of an inward work. We believe in the commemoration of the Lord's Supper by the symbolic use of the bread and juice of the vine

spirit.title: Baptism with the Holy Spirit
spirit.description: We believe that the Baptism with the Holy Spirit is to endue the believer with power; and that His incoming is after the same manner as in Bible days

life.title: The Spirit-Filled Life
life.description: We believe that it is the will of God that we walk in the Spirit daily

gifts.title: The Gifts & Fruits of the Spirit
gifts.description: We believe that the Holy Spirit has gifts to bestow upon the Christian; and that we should show spiritual fruit as evidence of a Spirit-filled life

moderation.title: Moderation
moderation.description: We believe that the experience and daily walk of the believer should never lead him into extremes of fanaticism

divine.title: Divine Healing
divine.description: We believe that divine healing is the power of Christ to heal the physically sick in answer to the prayer of faith

coming.title: The Second Coming of Christ
coming.description: We believe that the second coming of Christ is personal and imminent

evangelism.title: Evangelism
evangelism.description: We believe that the church's primary responsibility is to take the gospel to the entire world and make disciples

tithes.title: Tithes and Offerings
tithes.description: We believe that God has ordained tithes and offerings as the method for supporting and advancing His work

history.title: Our History
history.subtitle: Wind of the Spirit Worship Center
history.description: Learn how Founding Pastor Michael Edwards, ThD, and Lady Sherrie Edwards have shaped a community through decades of devoted ministry.
history.carouselItem1: Since 1976, the Edwards have impacted lives through teaching, counseling, discipleship, and church planting, leading to the founding of A New and Living Way Foursquare Church in 1989.
history.carouselItem2: By God's divine plan, their church merged with another congregation to form Wind of the Spirit Worship Center, becoming a vital community resource and ministry partner.
history.carouselItem3: Known as “The Wind,” the church is celebrated for its outreach, leadership training, and expressive worship, embodying Christ's love and leaving a legacy of faithful stewardship that endures today.
